EDU_COURSE.COURSE_ID, EDU_COURSE.COURSE_NAME, EDU_COURSE.IS_AVALIABLE, EDU_COURSE.SUBJECT_ID, EDU_COURSE.SUBJECT_LINK, EDU_COURSE.ADD_TIME, EDU_COURSE.SOURCE_PRICE, EDU_COURSE.CURRENT_PRICE, EDU_COURSE.TITLE, EDU_COURSE.CONTEXT, EDU_COURSE.LESSION_NUM, EDU_COURSE.LOGO, EDU_COURSE.UPDATE_TIME, EDU_COURSE.PAGE_BUYCOUNT, EDU_COURSE.PAGE_VIEWCOUNT, EDU_COURSE.END_TIME, EDU_COURSE.LOSETYPE, EDU_COURSE.LOSE_TIME
mapper.update: UPDATE EDU_COURSE SET EDU_COURSE.COURSE_NAME=#{courseName}, EDU_COURSE.SUBJECT_ID=#{subjectId}, EDU_COURSE.IS_AVALIABLE=#{isavaliable}, EDU_COURSE.SUBJECT_LINK=#{subjectLink}, EDU_COURSE.SOURCE_PRICE=#{sourcePrice}, EDU_COURSE.CURRENT_PRICE=#{currentPrice}, EDU_COURSE.TITLE=#{title}, EDU_COURSE.CONTEXT=#{context}, EDU_COURSE.LESSION_NUM=#{lessionNum}, EDU_COURSE.LOGO=#{logo}, EDU_COURSE.UPDATE_TIME=#{updateTime}, EDU_COURSE.PAGE_BUYCOUNT=#{pageBuycount}, EDU_COURSE.PAGE_VIEWCOUNT=#{pageViewcount}, EDU_COURSE.END_TIME=#{endTime}, EDU_COURSE.LOSETYPE=#{loseType}, EDU_COURSE.LOSE_TIME=#{loseTime} WHERE EDU_COURSE.COURSE_ID=#{courseId}
UPDATE EDU_COURSE SET EDU_COURSE.IS_AVALIABLE=#{type} WHERE EDU_COURSE.COURSE_ID=#{courseId}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM EDU_WEBSITE_COURSE_DETAIL LEFT JOIN EDU_COURSE ON EDU_COURSE.COURSE_ID = EDU_WEBSITE_COURSE_DETAIL.COURSE_ID WHERE EDU_COURSE.IS_AVALIABLE=1 AND EDU_COURSE.END_TIME>NOW() ORDER BY EDU_WEBSITE_COURSE_DETAIL.RECOMMEND_ID,EDU_COURSE.PAGE_VIEWCOUNT DESC

SELECT FROM EDU_COURSE
LEFT JOIN SYS_SUBJECT ON SYS_SUBJECT.SUBJECT_ID=EDU_COURSE.SUBJECT_ID
LEFT JOIN EDU_COURSE_TEACHER ON EDU_COURSE_TEACHER.COURSE_ID=EDU_COURSE.COURSE_ID
EDU_COURSE.IS_AVALIABLE=#{e.isavaliable}
AND EDU_COURSE.COURSE_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{e.courseName},'%')
AND EDU_COURSE.SUBJECT_LINK LIKE CONCAT('%,',#{e.subjectId},',%')
AND EDU_COURSE_TEACHER.TEACHER_ID=#{e.teacherId}
and EDU_COURSE.CURRENT_PRICE=0
ORDER BY EDU_COURSE.PAGE_VIEWCOUNT DESC
ORDER BY EDU_COURSE.ADD_TIME DESC
ORDER BY EDU_COURSE.CURRENT_PRICE ASC
ORDER BY EDU_COURSE.CURRENT_PRICE DESC

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EDU_COURSE
LEFT JOIN SYS_SUBJECT ON SYS_SUBJECT.SUBJECT_ID=EDU_COURSE.SUBJECT_ID
LEFT JOIN EDU_COURSE_TEACHER ON EDU_COURSE_TEACHER.COURSE_ID=EDU_COURSE.COURSE_ID
EDU_COURSE.IS_AVALIABLE=#{e.isavaliable}
AND EDU_COURSE.COURSE_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{e.courseName},'%')
AND EDU_COURSE.SUBJECT_LINK LIKE CONCAT('%,',#{e.subjectId},',%')
AND EDU_COURSE_TEACHER.TEACHER_ID=#{e.teacherId}
and EDU_COURSE.CURRENT_PRICE=0

SELECT EDU_COURSE.COURSE_ID as courseId, EDU_COURSE.COURSE_NAME as courseName, EDU_COURSE.TITLE as title, EDU_COURSE.LOGO as logo, EDU_COURSE.PAGE_BUYCOUNT as pageBuycount FROM EDU_COURSE WHERE EDU_COURSE.IS_AVALIABLE=1 AND EDU_COURSE.END_TIME>NOW() AND EDU_COURSE.SUBJECT_LINK LIKE CONCAT('%,',#{subjectId},',%') AND EDU_COURSE.COURSE_ID!=#{courseId}
LIMIT #{count}

SELECT FROM EDU_COURSE LEFT JOIN EDU_ORDERS ON EDU_ORDERS.COURSE_ID= EDU_COURSE.COURSE_ID WHERE EDU_ORDERS.USER_ID=#{e} AND STATES='SUCCESS' AND EDU_ORDERS.EXPIRE_TIME>NOW() ORDER BY EDU_ORDERS.PAY_TIME DESC
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EDU_COURSE LEFT JOIN EDU_ORDERS ON EDU_ORDERS.COURSE_ID= EDU_COURSE.COURSE_ID WHERE EDU_ORDERS.USER_ID=#{e} AND STATES='SUCCESS' AND EDU_ORDERS.EXPIRE_TIME>NOW()

SELECT EDU_COURSE.COURSE_NAME AS courseName,EDU_COURSE.COURSE_ID AS courseId FROM EDU_COURSE LEFT JOIN EDU_ORDERS ON EDU_ORDERS.COURSE_ID= EDU_COURSE.COURSE_ID WHERE EDU_ORDERS.USER_ID=#{userId} AND STATES='SUCCESS' AND EDU_ORDERS.EXPIRE_TIME>NOW() ORDER BY EDU_ORDERS.PAY_TIME DESC
LIMIT #{count}

SELECT FROM EDU_WEBSITE_COURSE_DETAIL LEFT JOIN EDU_COURSE ON EDU_COURSE.COURSE_ID = EDU_WEBSITE_COURSE_DETAIL.COURSE_ID WHERE EDU_COURSE.IS_AVALIABLE=1 AND EDU_WEBSITE_COURSE_DETAIL.RECOMMEND_ID=#{recommendId} AND (EDU_COURSE.END_TIME is NULL OR EDU_COURSE.END_TIME>NOW()) ORDER BY RAND()
LIMIT #{count}
mapper.update: update EDU_COURSE set PAGE_VIEWCOUNT = PAGE_VIEWCOUNT + 1 set PAGE_BUYCOUNT = PAGE_BUYCOUNT + 1 where COURSE_ID=#{courseId}
